title: Personal Site Strategy Guide
description:
Strategic guide for tanwa.info based on research and positioning analysis.

## Core Positioning
- Physics PhD → VC Tech Advisor (unique bridge)
- Senior Technical Advisor at SCB 10X ($700M+ fund)
- 9+ years academic, 4+ years VC advisory
- Building AI-augmented teams (Flight Notes theme)

## Target Outcomes
1. Attract advisory clients (startups needing tech due diligence)
2. Build thought leadership (speaking, newsletter growth)
3. Support ventures (Two Flamingos, F492, Lumicello)

## Content Pillars
1. Technical Due Diligence Expert
2. Blockchain/AI Researcher Who Builds
3. Conference Speaker & Thought Leader
4. Small Team Operations (Flight Notes)

## Key Differentiators
- Rare bridge: academia + VC + builder
- Hands-on: 2,171 GitHub contributions/year
- Published research: 400+ citations
- Cross-domain: Physics → Blockchain → AI

## Implementation Principles
- Lead with outcomes, not credentials
- Show don't tell (link to actual work)
- Be specific, avoid jargon
- One coherent brand across all platforms

See research/positioning-strategy.md for full analysis.

## Implementation
